de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic

Class AbstractLotSizingPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.AbstractLotSizingPeriod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalDistributedLotSizingPeriod

    public abstract class AbstractLotSizingPeriod
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a single period in a stochastic lot sizing problem. In the following documentation the time index of this period is denoted by t. This class is used to store the parameters of the Period. To represent the solution it is to be put into a appropriate wrapper class as found in the package de.kue.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solution
    Author:
    Andi Popp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
